name: Anode Heart (itch)
description:
Anode Heart is a Digimon inspired RPG where you collect and raise monsters, friends and waifus, as you piece together the story and the lore.

Demo is available to try out for free and is about 1-2 hours long. Full game's development plan and release date is yet to be defined. Also, keep in mind that this demo only serves as a... well, demo. Features are not yet complete and there are many things that will be improved and expanded over time.

If you'd like to support this project, you can donate through patreon (and get bonus rewards in return! [e.g. name in credits, monthly early access builds with new features and content, ingame character, etc.).

If you have any feedback or you encounter any problems or bugs, comment below or ask in Discord.

Thank you for playing!

---------------------------------------------------

PATREON: https://patreon.com/AnodeHeart
